promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young rare lion electric-type pokemon wearing a lightning-charged crown. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltigon, a a chibi young rare lion electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Flash Ray. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "electric" or "Voltigon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, lion-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This mini maned spark-cub thrives in high altitudes, playfully unleashing Flash Rays to brighten its rocky home as it frolics with other creatures.
